desc: Intended as a capstone course for the major, the seminar studies a selected topic, figure or movement in philosophy, with emphasis on student presentations in class. Consult department's prospectus for details. Prerequisite: upper level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered every year.
name: Sem: Free Will
prerequisites: Prerequisite: upper level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered every year.
title: Seminar
